text: Cloud Computing Resources at NOAA Fisheries

title: NOAA Fisheries OST Onboarding and Offboarding
text: This website contains information about onboarding and offboarding employees and collaborators to projects within NOAA Fisheries Office of Science and Technology (OST). Below is the process that a branch director and onboarded/offboarded employee should follow to successfully integrate or leave the agency.

title: NOAA Fisheries OST Onboarding and Offboarding
text:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome
We are happy for you to join onto our team in NOAA! Here at OST, we take on a large breadth of responsibilities. We aim to execute modern and high-quality data collection, management, and open access programs. For more information, please go to our internal webpage to access resources, organization charts, and more.

ST4 Projects Overview


National Stock Assessment Program


Fisheris Integrated Modeling System (FIMS)
Stock Assessment Workflows (asar, stockplotr)
Fisheries Integrated Toolbox (FIT)
DisMAP
Stock Information System (SIS)
Stock Synthesis 3 (SS3)
Ecosystem and Socioeconomic Indicators
Human Dimension in Stock Assessments


Monitoring


National Survey Program
National Fishery Observer Program
Bycatch Monitoring
Cooperative Research





How to Get Started
